welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bridgeport, where the charm of our historic city meets the beauty of our waterfront views. Known for our rich history, vibrant arts scene, and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bridgeport has to offer.

restaurants.name: Oliverio's Ristorante
restaurants.description: Oliverio's Ristorante is a italian restaurant located in Bridgeport.
restaurants.address: 507 E Main St (at 5th St), Bridgeport, WV 26330

restaurants.name: Mia Margherita Coal Fired Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Mia Margherita Coal Fired Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Bridgeport.

restaurants.name: Meagher's Irish Pub
restaurants.description: Meagher's Irish Pub is a irish pub located in Bridgeport.

restaurants.name: Dave's Famous T & L Hot Dogs
restaurants.description: Dave's Famous T & L Hot Dogs is a hot dog joint located in Bridgeport.

restaurants.name: El Rincon
restaurants.description: El Rincon is a mexican restaurant located in Bridgeport.
restaurants.address: 112 Thompson Dr (in Gabriel's Plaza), Bridgeport, WV 26330

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at New Haven Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
